metadata.title: CVE-2020-9498 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Apache Guacamole 1.1.0 and older may mishandle pointers involvedinprocessing data received via RDP static virtual channels. If auserconnects to a malicious or compromised RDP server, a seriesofspecially-crafted PDUs could result in memory corruption,possiblyallowing arbitrary code to be executed with the privileges oftherunning guacd process.

criterions.comment: guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
